amendment.description: To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund for providing an above the line Federal income tax deduction for individuals purchasing health insurance outside the workplace.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4339 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.

action.text: Amendment SA 4339 proposed by Senator DeMint. (consideration: CR 3/14/2008 S2080-2081 text: CR 3/14/2008 S2080-2081) To provide for a deficit-neutral reserve fund for providing an above the line Federal income tax deduction for individuals purchasing health insurance outside the workplace.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 4339 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 4339 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 51. Record Vote Number: 82.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4339 proposed by Senator DeMint.
